channel.title: libreoffice on Silviu's Blog

item.title: OpenOffice.org / Libreoffice pasted numbers automatically get changed to dates
item.description: I’ve been pasting some information from some weblogs into Calc (the LibreOffice Excel equivalent) and some version numbers like 1.5.30 got changed to dates. All the documentation pointed me towards changing the cell format to text. That only works if you type the numbers, not if you paste them. When you paste them the cell format get changed to number again. Read more for the solution…
